allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Admin dashboard improvements and bug fixes

- Fix vehicle verification \(send correct boolean flags to backend\)
- Fix vehicle creation to set verification_state for admin users
- Add draggable curtain/divider to vehicle view modal
- Optimize new vehicle creation \(single row skeleton, no full table reload\)
- Fix session expiry with automatic logout and toast notification
- Remove duplicate ToastContainer causing React 19 errors
- Add global ToastContainer in App.jsx
- Update Redux vehicleSlice for optimistic updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
